sections.text: Definitions; duties of bureau; hospital and outpatient facilities for drug dependents; application for license, fee; review and action upon license applications; expiration of license, renewal, conditional permit; denial, revocation or suspension of license, procedure; reinstatement of revoked or suspended license; injunctive proceedings; right of entry and inspection; Methadone Treatment Medication Units; annual reports; exceptions [Repealed].Repealed by 73 Del. Laws, c. 358, § 1, effective July 8, 2002.
